amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide states the authority to impose more protective operational requirements on the discharge of ballast water within state resource waters.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 112-267 to provide states the authority to impose more protective operational requirements on the discharge of ballast water within state resource waters.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (NY) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 225 (Roll no. 835).
